metadata.title: 5212-1 -- Apache HTTP Server vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that the Apache HTTP Server incorrectly handled certain forward proxy requests. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause the server to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly perform a Server Side Request Forgery attack. (CVE-2021-44224)  It was discovered that the Apache HTTP Server Lua module incorrectly handled memory in the multipart parser. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause the server to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2021-44790)
